shape_3_per_frame1=bass_slo= (bass_slo*0.9 + bass_att)/2;
shape_3_per_frame2=x=0.5 - bass_slo*0.08;
shape_3_per_frame3=y=0.4 - bass_slo*0.22 + (bass_slo*bass_slo*bass_slo* 0.04);
shape_3_per_frame4=ang=bass_slo*2;
shape_3_per_frame5=rad=bass_slo*0.3;
shape_3_per_frame6=
per_frame_init_1=mv_x=64;mv_y=48;
per_frame_init_2=nut=0;
per_frame_init_3=stp=0;stq=0;
per_frame_init_4=rtp=0;rtq=0;
per_frame_init_5=wvr=0;
per_frame_init_6=decay=0;
per_frame_init_7=dcsp=0
per_frame_init_8=
per_frame_1=decay=0.99;
per_frame_2=wave_x=(sin(time*0.4)*0.3)+0.5;
per_frame_3=wave_y=(cos(time*0.443)*0.3)+0.5;
per_frame_4=wave_r=(treb*treb)*0.3;
per_frame_5=wave_g=(mid*mid)*0.3;
per_frame_6=wave_b=(bass*bass)*0.3;
per_frame_7=wave_a=0.0;
per_frame_8=mv_x=48+ (sin(time)*16);
per_frame_9=mv_y=32+ (cos(time)*16);
per_frame_10=//mv_a=mid*mid+0.07;
per_frame_11=mv_a=0.7;
per_frame_12=mv_r=(((sin(time*0.2)+1)/2)*0.7);
per_frame_13=mv_g=((sin( (time+120)*0.2)+1)/2)*0.7;
per_frame_14=mv_b=((sin( (time+240)*0.2)+1)/2)*0.7;
per_frame_15=ib_r=mv_g;ib_g=mv_b;ib_b=mv_r;
per_frame_16=ib_a=mid*0.1
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=
per_frame_19=
per_pixel_1=xad=(x-0.5)*2;yad=(y-0.5)*2;
per_pixel_2=st=sin(time);ct=cos(time);stl=sin(time*0.2);
per_pixel_3=zoom=1.05+(xad* (st*0.07) )+(yad* (ct*0.07) );
per_pixel_4=rot=(sin(ang*(stl*7) ))*0.02
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    // take the difference between the crisp and blurred images,
warp_7=`    // then add it back into the image.  Creates spots and stripes over time,
warp_8=`    // basically by breaking up big blocks of white color.
warp_9=`    ret += (ret - GetBlur1(uv))*0.5;
warp_10=`    ret *= 0.9;
warp_11=`
warp_12=`   // add noise:
warp_13=`   float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw * 0.4 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_14=`   ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5)/256.0 * 12 * saturate(treb_att-1);
warp_15=`
warp_16=`   // desaturate over time, to keep the globs white
warp_17=`   ret = lerp(ret, lum(ret), 0.08);
warp_18=`}
